body: A spellcaster with a spell component pouch is assumed to have all the material components and focuses needed for spellcasting, except for components that have a specific cost, divine focuses, and focuses that wouldn't fit in a pouch. Most spell component pouches are waterproof and can be strung onto a belt or bandolier.
name: Spell Component Pouch
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Tools and Skill Kits/Spell Component Pouch
